changelog: Version 2.2.1: Added ADS FOV feature with toggle/hold modes and improved interactive keybind system, added config export/import functionality, plus bug fixes and minor improvements. Major version 2.0 includes: Complete mouse module architectural refactoring with modular multi-backend support, three new aiming modes (Bezier, NCAF, WindMouse), MSS screen capture, Mouse Lock feature, custom HSV configuration, aimbot activation types, major RCS & Silent Aim improvements with Y-axis release, and extensive UI enhancements
